english.segment1: Within my mind's eye. Flickering from the past. Come images that terrify and calm. A paradox in me
english.segment2: Nail pierced hands they run with blood. A splitting brow forced by the thorns. His face is writhing with the pain yet it's comforting to me
english.segment3: He chose to give it all. Jesus endured the pain. Paying a debt I owed and created a paradox in me
english.segment4: Nail pierced hands they run with blood. A splitting brow forced by the thorns. His face is writhing with the pain yet it's comforting to me
english.segment5: And in my heart I know that you're the only one. Who could of came and died, a sacrifice. As your God's only son
